channel.title: Let's connect to the lesson!
channel.description: A blog about link to the lesson and connection instructions

item.title: Online Lessons!
item.description:
Hello everyone, Our classes will take place every Tuesday and Friday at 1:00 pm to 2:00 pm. You will need to follow the link below to connect to the lesson: - Join Zoom Meeting https://ionio-gr.zoom.us/j/97733346096?pwd=U21rZm1HS1kzQnF3ZkorVGQ4aUpyZz09 Instructions for connecting and adjusting to the lesson: - The lesson code is "online" which you will need to enter each time you connect. - You should connect 5 minutes before the start of the lesson. - It is essential to use your camera and microphone so that the lesson can be interactive. - Don't forget to have your books with you. Thank you very much!

Tags: keep-this-tag-format, tags-are-optional, example
item.dc:creator: Olumpiaalexopoulou
